content.text:
{"session_header":"[SESSION_HEADER]
Timestamp: 1492 DR, Night, 21:30:00
Location: Ruined Observatory, Frontier Wilderness
Status: Lvl 1 Fighter Aric | HP: 12/12 | XP: 0/300 | Gold: 10gp","resources":"HP: 12/12 | Rations: 10 days | Torches: 2 | Exhaustion: 0","narrative":"The storm lashes against the crumbling stone walls of the observatory as lightning splits the sky, illuminating the shattered dome above. Rain pours through the broken roof in sheets, pooling on the ancient astronomical instruments scattered across the floor. The wind howls through fractured windows, their glass long since shattered by time and weather.

You are Aric—a practical soul who chose this ruined watchtower as your post tonight, far from the nearest settlement. The frontier has been restless lately, and someone needs to keep watch. The storm provides cover, but also masks approaching danger.

A flicker of movement catches your eye through the rain-streaked eastern window. Something out there, moving against the wind.","planning_block":{"thinking":"The storm obscures vision and hearing, but movement was spotted. Could be an animal, could be trouble. The ruined observatory offers limited defensibility—good sightlines but exposed positions.","choices":{"investigate_movement":{"text":"Investigate the Movement","description":"Head to the eastern window to get a better look at what's out there","risk_level":"medium"},"hold_position":{"text":"Hold Position","description":"Stay put and wait—if something approaches, you'll have the advantage","risk_level":"low"},"circle_around":{"text":"Circle Around","description":"Exit through the back and approach from a different angle","risk_level":"medium"}}},"state_updates":{}}
